text:
*[Bug 18675] plot() applies argument 'font' to tick mark labels, not just to plotted points*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18675>

--- Comment #5 from J. R. M. Hosking (<mailto:jrmhosking@gmail.com|jrmhosking@gmail.com>) ---
Thank you again for your response. I'm sorry I can't do more for the state of
your brow.

Yes, for my original example the 2nd and 3rd of your suggestions are effective.
To get bold plotted symbols without bold tick mark labels, one must have
'font=2' in force when the symbols are drawn but not have 'font=2' in the call
to plot().
